Package index

cli handlers

cli handlers for folding cli calls into logger

logged_cli_handler()
Redirect CLI messages to logger
metayer_cli_handler()
Handle CLI messages

wrapped cli functions

cli_app_factory()
Create the default CLI app object
cli_abort() cli_alert() cli_alert_danger() cli_alert_info() cli_alert_success() cli_alert_warning() cli_blockquote() cli_bullets() cli_bullets_raw() cli_code() cli_div() cli_dl() cli_end() cli_format() cli_format_method() cli_h1() cli_h2() cli_h3() cli_inform() cli_li() cli_list_themes() cli_ol() cli_output_connection() cli_par() cli_process_done() cli_process_failed() cli_process_start() cli_progress_along() cli_progress_bar() cli_progress_builtin_handlers() cli_progress_cleanup() cli_progress_demo() cli_progress_done() cli_progress_message() cli_progress_num() cli_progress_output() cli_progress_step() cli_progress_styles() cli_progress_update() cli_rule() cli_sitrep() cli_status() cli_status_clear() cli_status_update() cli_text() cli_tick_reset() cli_ul() cli_vec() cli_verbatim() cli_warn()
wrapped cli functions

vignette functions

functions to help write vignettes with jupyter lab

build_vignette()
Build a vignette from a jupyter notebook
display_source()
Highlight a source file or the source files in a directory
display_text()
"as.character", applied uniformly across context

environmental functions

env_rename()
Rename an environment
env_stack()
Return the environment stack

storage functions

storage_env()
Retrieve a storage environment
storage_purge()
Purge the storage

testing functions

test_filter()
A less motivational test
test_sanitize()
Basic test sanitation
with_message_buf()
Capture messages in a bytestream

utility functions

deprecated()
Raise an error for deprecated functions
hash_trim()
Trim a hash value
not_yet_implemented()
Raise an error for not yet implemented functions
logger_reset()
Reset the logger logs
rm.all()
Utility function that resets the global environment.
